siteMetadata.name: Jonathan Paynter
siteMetadata.title: Jonathan Paynter | Undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer
siteMetadata.description: 3rd year undergraduate Electronic and Information Engineer at Imperial College London.
siteMetadata.about:
I'm a 3rd-going-on-4th year undergraduate studying Electronic and Information Engineering.
              Pre-lockdown my interests were hiking, running, climbing and swimming, something I hope to resume shortly.
              I am academically interested in all elements of AI, but specifically I'd like to continue in reinforcement learning, and AI in social science.

frontmatter.title: Track and Trace System Architecture Design
frontmatter.description: Designing an architecture for a UK track and trace system.
